title: account_ifttt_rule
description: IFTTT rules generated by account for specific triggers

_id.description: Unique mongodb id for a document. Auto generated

trigger_condition.description: Condition on which this IFTTT should be triggered. For ex. <received_value> <condition> <value> : 1 == 1

condition.description: The matching on which this ifttt should trigger. Values Ex. (not ) greater, lesser, equal

value.description: The value on which this condition should trigger. For ex. 1 for occupancy, 34 for temprature

trigger_event.description: Event which should if IFTTT is triggered. For ex. <attribute> <value> : LIGHT_ON_OFF set 1

set_attribute.description: The attribute which should be set. For ex. LIGHT_ON_OFF

value.description: The value to be set for the attribute. For ex. 1

event_devices.description: Devices ids on which the rule should be applied

account_id.description: Account to which the ifttt is mapped

_id.description: Mongo DB default index on document
